name: Blaster (eboatwright)
description:
My first game in Monogame!

Blast your way through one big level, and try to beat the boss!

Controls:

 - Left and Right Arrow Keys: Movement

 - X: Jump

 - Z: Shoot

Github repository: https://github.com/eboatwright/blaster

The music was made by Gruber! Here's his links: - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCegheZHIpMbFwxbY4jrc8DA - https://twitter.com/gruber_music
